"Substance Over Speed! III":
"Heh heh, hmmmm. Are you sure you aren't tired?
You're about to have the rug pulled out from under you if you are unprepared.
Your task this time is the following quest.
The goal is the same, clearing with an S Rank is required!
How about this?
Do you think this is something a
former untrained hack like you can clear?
*Clear on Very Hard with an S Rank"

"へーへー、ふーんふーん。
アンタ本当はあんまり疲れてないの？
でも、油断してたら足をすくわれるわよ。
今度の課題はこのクエストよ。
目的も同じ、Ｓランククリア必須！
さあ、これならどうかしら？
元へっぽこぴーのアンタに
クリアできるものかしら？

※ベリーハード以上、Ｓランククリア"
